title: Integrating Case-Based Learning with Online Discussion Facilitation Strategies in Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Theories and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening case analysis and discussion competencies in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners systematically apply discussion facilitation strategies by analyzing real-world educational cases.
Learners can improve online discussion participation rates by 30% or more using social/cognitive congruence strategies.
Learners can explain the impact of instructor feedback based on content expertise on problem-solving.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
